title: Jehu Anointed King
summary: Elisha sends a prophet to anoint Jehu king of Israel. Jehu immediately begins a divinely ordained purge by killing King Joram of Israel and King Ahaziah of Judah. He then has Queen Jezebel thrown from a window and trampled to death, fulfilling prophecy.

faq.question: Who anointed Jehu as king?
faq.answer: A young prophet sent by Elisha.

faq.question: What happened to Queen Jezebel?
faq.answer: She was thrown from a window and trampled by horses, just as Elijah had prophesied.
